featured.text: What is PBS most famous for? (A) Cable services.
Nor is it one of the cable networks such as CNN, which carries only news and news stories.
It is not ESPN, the all-sports cable network, or even MTV, which is famous for its music videos.
In Taiwan, some cable TV companies have up to 70 or 80 ________.
PBS has 349 member television stations in the U.S. and some member stations by cable in Canada.

definition.zh_def: 一種由導體組成的長條形物體，用於傳輸電力或信號。
definition.en_def: A long, flexible object made of conductors used for transmitting electricity or signals.
definition.example: The technician installed a new cable to improve the internet connection.
